Package org.example.implementations.banks

Class BankImp

java.lang.Object
org.example.implementations.banks.BankImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Bank, Publisher
public class BankImp extends Object implements Bank, Publisher
Class where users and accounts are stored and which provides API for bank`s operations
